Title: Save the Last One
Writer: Frank Darabont (developed by), Robert Kirkman (series of graphic novels), Tony Moore (series of graphic novels), Charlie Adlard (series of graphic novels), Scott M. Gimple
Actors: Andrew Lincoln, Jon Bernthal, Sarah Wayne Callies, Laurie Holden
Plot: As Carl's condition continues to deteriorate, Shane and Otis try to dodge the walkers as they head back to the farm.
